name: slides
description: Auto-scaling GitHub Self-Hosted runners with AWS serverless for a few cents
author: Niek Palm and Scott Guymer

scripts.build-html: marp slides-${CONFERENCE:-default}.md --html --allow-local-files -o build-${CONFERENCE:-default}/index.html && mkdir -p build-${CONFERENCE:-default} && cp -r assets build-${CONFERENCE:-default}/assets
scripts.build-all: npn run build-html && npn run build-pdf
